channel.title: Authors on Rami's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Rami's Blog

item.title: Rami Sabbagh
item.description: Self Introduction Been programming for almost ~8 years now. Made my first game at the age of ~13. Previousely created LIKO-12, an open-source learning environment that felt like old computers, inspired by PICO-8, Commodore 64 and little bit of DOS. Interested in computers, LEGO, Raspberry Pi, math some of electronics.
